segments.text: I went shopping without my umbrella yesterday morning .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yesterday morning was beautiful I thought the sunning was going to continue .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So did I . that's why I didn't take my umbrella . I got cold in the rain in the afternoon . It was raining cats and dogs .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know . I could not believe it when I got hit by that storm . It was pouring with rain all afternoon .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We really have some movable weather sometime . I wish I would live somewhere which were sunning all year round .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If it was sunning all year round there would be drought . You probably would not like it either .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I guess you are right . Maybe I just wish the weather could be a little more predictable .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The weather forecasters are not good at predicting the weather would be like . Our weather is so changeable .
segments.speaker: S2
